name: Minimal Classic Game
description:
This is a (rather minimal and barren) game inspired by classic arcade games. It is part of the lecture Game Design and Development II, the task is to make it juicy by adding effects such as color, easing (movement, scaling, …), animation effects, sound, particles, camera shake, and so on!

More details about the lecture can be found on the website, as well as details regarding this assignment.

Controls

Move with [w] and [d] keys, alternatively use the arrow keys [🠔] [🠖].

Fire with [space].

Feel free to place juicier control instructions.

Play / Download

The minimal WebGL game can be played here. The Unity 2020.3.3f1 project files can be downloaded below.
